job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtCompany DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtISO a Verisk business has been a leading source of information about propertycasualty insurance risk since 1971 For a broad spectrum of commercial and personal lines of insurance ISO provides statistical actuarial underwriting and claims information and analytics compliance and fraud identification tools policy language information about specific locations and technical services ISO serves insurers reinsurers agents and brokers insurance regulators risk managers and other participants in the propertycasualty insurance marketplace To learn more about ISO please visit us at â€¯wwwveriskcomiso We are proud to be a part of the Verisk family of companiesltbrgtltbrgtAt the heart of what we do is help clients manage risk Verisk Nasdaq VRSK provides data and insights to our customers in insurance energy and the financial services markets so they can make faster and more informed decisionsltbrgtltbrgtOur global team uses AI machine learning automation and other emerging technologies to collect and analyze billions of records We provide advanced decisionsupport to prevent credit lending and cyber risks In addition we monitor and advise companies on complex global matters such as climate change catastrophes and geopolitical issuesltbrgtltbrgtBut why we do our work is what sets us apart It stems from a commitment to making the world better safer and strongerltbrgtltbrgtIts the reason Verisk is part of the UN Global Compact sustainability initiative Its why we made a commitment to balancing 100 percent of our carbon emissions Its the aim of our returnship program for experienced professionals rejoining the workforce after time away And its what drives our annual Innovation Day where we identify our next firsttomarket innovations to solve our customers problemsltbrgtltbrgtAt its core Verisk uses data to minimize risk and maximize value But far bigger is why we do what we doltbrgtltbrgtAt Verisk you can build an exciting career with meaningful work create positive and lasting impact on business and find the support coaching and training you need to advance your career We have received the Great Place to Work Certification for the fifth consecutive year Weve been recognized by ltemgtForbesltemgt as a Worlds Best Employer and a Best Employer for Women testaments to our culture of engagement and the value we place on an inclusive and diverse workforce Verisks Statement on Racial Equity and Diversity supports our commitment to these values and affecting positive and lasting change in the communities where we live and workltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtResponsible for software application development and maintenance for products that generate risk information for all locations in the United States ltligtltligtThis position uses PostgresOracle database and Geographical Information System GIS functionality on spatial data for the USltligtltligtThe major components of this position include 1 Maintenance of existing code and resolving issues and questions pertaining to existing processes 2 Research investigation and prototyping new products and improvements in processes flow 3 Development of code for new products process improvement and product changes 4 Optimize existing algorithms to improve performance Position requires learning and understanding business rules and logicltligtltligtLearn company products including source code and product market niches ltligtltligtLearn functions of other departments and where they fit into software development cycle Some Web application development and maintenance to support the work of the operations productiontest or software teams ltligtltligtLearn and participate in all areas of Software Engineering Process including design and innovation of new software specifications implementation testing and release cycle ltligtltligtProperly document track and test work ltligtltligtFollow quality standards with regard to coding commenting unit testing debugging documenting releasing and versioning codeltligtltligtProvide internal support to determine and resolve software quality problems in existing software productsltligtltligtParticipate in the development of new departmental processes that improve our ability to develop software to established quality levels including source code control configuration management software releases ltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBS or MS in Computer Science Mathematics Physics or other scientific disciplineltligtltligtUp to 5 years experience working on group programming projectsltligtltligtProgramming skills SQL Scripting Java or ObjectOriented Programming LanguageltligtltligtKnowledge of SQL and databases  Postgres andor OracleltligtltligtGraphic Information Systems GIS experienceknowledge  PreferredltligtltligtKnowledge of GIT and BitBucket  PreferredltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAdditional InformationltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtVerisk Analytics is an equal opportunity employerltbrgtltbrgtAll members of the Verisk Analytics family of companies are equal opportunity employers We consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race religion color national origin citizenship sex gender identity
